header.HexAddressTooltip: Current ETH Address. Others can send CKB to this address using wallets that support pw-lock.
header.ckbAddressTooltip: A Transit Address. When you receive CKB from exchanges or CKB wallets with no full address support, please use this address.

trade.maxIntro: Free capacity in your current account
trade.lessThanMaxNumber: The value should be less than MAX
trade.executionFeeDesc: This fee was paid to the dealmaker who matches your order
trade.transactionFeeDesc: This fee was paid to the CKB miner
trade.suggestionTooltip: Market Price. With this price, orders are highly likely to be filled, but not guaranteed. Unfilled order will be opening on chain.
trade.maxPay: The maximum balance you can use to pay
